titles.title: Raising a question of the privileges of the House.

action.text: Mr. Cantor moved to table the measure.
On motion to table the measure Agreed to by recorded vote: 217 - 173, 10 Present (Roll no. 133).

term.name: Government ethics and transparency, public corruption
House Committee on Oversight and Government Reform

bill.summary:
3/13/2014--Introduced. Condemns the offensive and disrespectful manner in which Chairman Darrell E. Issa conducted the hearing of the House Committee on Oversight and Government Reform on March 5, 2014.
Requires that he come to the well of the House of Representatives to issue a public apology to Members of the House.
